speaker: Seth Juarez
title: New to Anomaly Detector: Multivariate Capabilities
description:
On this week's episode of the AI Show Live with Seth Juarez, Tony Xing joins the show to talk about the latest multivariate capabilities with Anomaly Detector. https://aka.ms/ADMultivariateQuickstarts Stay tuned after the segment as Seth gets back to work on his Roshambo game.
